short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to enlarge tax-included prices on Amazon Business.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enhances the shopping experience by highlighting tax-included prices, making them larger and easier to spot compared to the default tax-excluded prices.

With this extension, you can:

Easily compare tax-included prices while browsing Amazon Business.
Avoid confusion between tax-excluded and tax-included prices.
Streamline your purchasing decisions by seeing the full cost upfront.
